name: Shortcut (Cayde)
description:
This is unbelievable. That officer had NO business having my car towed away. I didn't park anywhere NEAR that spot!! They're just picking me out for having one of those self-driving cars, I know it. Oh well, better get my car back and head home. 

-Controls-
               WASD - Movement      

Lower resolution windows recommended.

Shortcut is a very short game made in around a month for the HPS1's Summer of Shivers jam. It is my first game, so expect some potential bugs. Thank you for playing!
